text: Spanish Paralympic Committee (, CPE) is a Spanish non-profit sport organisation started in 1995. It oversees disability sport organisations in Spain. The organisation has a Secretary General and a President. Since 2005, they have been supported by Plan ADO. In 2000, the CPE had a scandal. == References == Category:1995 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in Spain Category:Paralympic Games Category:Sports organizations of Spain
title: Spanish Paralympic Committee
